instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message:
i have board i have problem to fix . Long time not been here so i decide to ask for help.
pin 27-28 on u7000 -20.5 ohm
R7047-10.5 ohm
R7031- 10.5 ohm
J6950 - pin 9,8,7   0.2v    pin 6 and 4    3.4v
what should i check. Help please

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: Green light present? PPBUS without battery?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: PPBUS_G3H - 12.33v  and green light on charger. also motherboard is powering no problem

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: 12.3 is too low and the SMC is not talking to the ISL6259. Disconnect the battery indicator cable to rule that out as a problem. See if PPBUS comes up to 12.6V now. If not do a diode mode reading on both data lines going to the battery.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: i measure board outside case on table so only magsafe is connected. so from what point should i measure to with point . i take it red probe will need to be on ground?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: Measure SMBUS_BATT_SCL and SDA on the battery connector. Diode mode with red on GND of course.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: That seems close enough. What are the voltages there?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: That is also ok. Check PPBUS again if it really is 12.23 or 12.56V. If you press the battery indicator do the LEDs light up?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: i connected charge and pressed battery connector but no light at all

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: This seems like a bad SMC...

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: Either a bad SMC or ISL6258 at this point.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530-a no charging
threads.message: ok. i replaced SMC chip and is working great. Thank you for help . Much appriciate
